= Hi, I'm Mr Panik! Call me Panik.

= With an opinion the size of my walls of text and a fascination with dumb shit, I proudly present my author page. I'll keep things as neat as I can, but it's me. No guarantees. 

= Who knows where any of this goes, tbh? I came here with no expectations and I can comfortably say I've exceeded them. 
------



[[tabview]]
[[tab My Work]]
= While I'm a fantasy writer to the bone, I've learned a lot about the nuances to my tastes as I've matured. I'll always have that magical core to my work, but here I hope to catalogue more than just some magic systems and thaumaturgy. 

= I have a keen interest in noir settings, investigations, apocalypses, disease, solarpunk. All-in-all, there's a lot of ground I have to cover, but I'm pretty sure I can curate a small collection of stories to really transport you.

= I mean, I'm a perfectionist, so I'll do my best.

[[tab Poorly Plans]]
||~ These are Poorly Plans in progress.||

Before I joined the Wiki, I had to make sure I had an idea and so, House Poorly was born. Here I'll unpack the value of what we create to ourselves and others, the desire and the willingness to create, and the duty we feel to our purpose as creators.

If you like character driven narratives, maybe they're a GOI you can make good use of. The series below is going to be a closed series, but as this unravels, if anyone would like to contribute, please feel free to reach out here on Wikidot. For now, here's the Tale thus far, presented in reading order.
